records.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
records.author: Martin Luther King

records.quote: Use what youâ€™ve been through as fuel, believe in yourself and be unstoppable!
records.author: Yvonne Pierre

records.quote: To succeed, you have to do something and be very bad at it for a while. You have to look bad before you can look really good.
records.author: Barbara DeAngelis

records.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
records.author: Nelson Mandela

records.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
records.author: Walt Disney

records.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
records.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

records.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
records.author: John Lennon

records.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
records.author: Mother Teresa
